title: Start
body:
<<faceRight Mia>>
<<faceRight Renata>>
<<pauseFor Mia 1.0>>
<<faceDown Renata>>
<<faceUp Mia>>
<<pauseFor Mia 1.0>>
<<faceRight Mia>>
<<faceRight Renata>>
<<pauseFor Mia 1.0>>
<<faceDown Renata>>
<<faceUp Mia>>
Mia: Where are we?
Renata: These look like bars. Roundier Haia definitely came through here!
Mia: Did he...go into one of the bars?
Renata: I dunno. Let's see if we can find him.
